• LEFT would move us further away.

Both UP and RIGHT seem safe on the board, with no wall, snake, or self-collision hazards. However, moving RIGHT increments our x coordinate, putting us directly in line horizontally with the target apple at (8,4). This horizontal approach reduces the gap swiftly and is in line with our strategy of quickly going for the nearest apple.

Thus, the clear choice is to move RIGHT.
